timeline.bodyText: @g4s8 would "decorate" be a better word than "override"?
timeline.author: carlosmiranda

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/artipie/http/rs/RsWithBody.java b/src/main/java/com/artipie/http/rs/RsWithBody.java
index 9dfeec7..6fdbde0 100644
--- a/src/main/java/com/artipie/http/rs/RsWithBody.java
+++ b/src/main/java/com/artipie/http/rs/RsWithBody.java

@@ -81,7 +81,7 @@ public final class RsWithBody implements Response {
     }
 
     /**
-     * Overrides origin response body with byte buffer.
+     * Decorates origin response body with byte buffer.
      * @param origin Response
      * @param buf Body buffer
      */
